content.question: Which of the following descriptions accurately represents area 2 of the graph?

choices.label: The threshold, in which signals have reached critical intensity and allow the neuron to fire
Hyperpolarization, in which positive ions have exited the axon
Repolarization, in which potassium ions exit the axon
Depolarization, in which sodium ions enter the axon

content.answer: Depolarization, in which sodium ions enter the axon
